nodes.name: Inaccurate assessment of AI existential risk due to abstract scenario reasoning
aliases: misguided AI risk estimates from abstraction
poor AI safety planning from abstract thinking
nodes.description: High-level, purely abstract discussions of future AI can lead to overlooking crucial details, resulting in incorrect estimates of catastrophic or extinction-level risks.
nodes.node_rationale: Explicitly referenced in Purposes section: checking abstract views about future AI against concrete instantiations.

nodes.name: Lack of concrete plausible AI future instantiations in discourse
nodes.description: Discussions often lack specific, plausible stories of how AI might develop and interact with society, leaving important mechanisms unexamined.
nodes.node_rationale: Highlighted in Purposes and Methods: need to fill out the space of plausible feasible scenarios.

nodes.name: Concrete scenario vignettes reveal hidden assumptions and biases in AI forecasting
nodes.description: Creating detailed stories makes implicit beliefs explicit, enabling critique and adjustment, thus potentially improving foresight accuracy.
nodes.node_rationale: Purposes: 'Notice recurring themes', 'Develop better intuitions', 'Decrease bias'.

nodes.name: Collaborative development and critique of AI vignettes to improve realism
nodes.description: Using group processes to draft, comment on, and iteratively refine scenarios ensures multiple perspectives and identifies realism gaps.
nodes.node_rationale: Methods: 'Write draft vignettes', 'Request comments', 'Modify according to comments'.

nodes.name: Iterative workshop-based vignette writing and feedback cycle
nodes.description: Small workshops produce initial stories, gather feedback, and repeat until critiques subside, yielding more realistic and varied scenarios.
nodes.node_rationale: Methods and Work so far: two small workshops and iterative steps 1-4.

nodes.name: Feedback-induced realism improvements observed in two AI Impacts workshops
nodes.description: The project reports that realism critiques decreased after multiple feedback rounds in two pilot workshops, indicating the method’s promising effectiveness.
nodes.node_rationale: Work so far section notes small workshops produced vignettes with iterative realism improvement.

nodes.name: Organize iterative AI vignette workshops to refine future AI scenarios
nodes.description: Schedule and facilitate recurring small workshops where participants draft AI future histories, solicit critiques, and revise until realism critiques subside.
nodes.intervention_lifecycle_rationale: This is a research-planning and community process, situated outside direct model development phases (closest: Methods section).
nodes.intervention_maturity_rationale: Only two small proof-of-concept workshops reported in Work so far → experimental maturity.
nodes.node_rationale: Represents the actionable step implied by Methods to mitigate identified risk.
